description: "A mid-17th century map of Asia, showing mainland Southeast Asia divided into regions such as Cochinchine, Chiampa and Tunquin (Vietnam), Sian (Thailand), Pegu, Martaban and Arracan (Myanmar), and Camboge (Cambodia)."
label: "Asie / par N. Sanson d'Abbeville, Geog. du Roy ; A. Peyrounin, sculp."
